name: winding-path.jpg
description: Image of a full, scenic, winding dirt path through a lush green forest with sunlight filtering through the trees.

name: jagged-graph-line.png
description: A colourful, jagged, and volatile graph line, glowing with bright red and orange colours, moving sharply up and down on a white background.

name: cityscape-2022.jpg
description: Image of a full, bustling, modern cityscape at dusk, with illuminated skyscrapers and streaks of traffic lights from cars below.

name: reopening-street-overlay.png
description: A colourful illustration of a lively street scene with a diverse crowd of people walking, shops with bright "Open" signs, and vibrant storefronts, on a white background.

name: dark-office.jpg
description: Image of a full, dimly lit, modern corporate office at night, with the lonely glow of computer monitors reflecting on empty desks.

name: stock-market-down.png
description: A colourful, bold, red 3D arrow pointing sharply downwards, superimposed over a faint, abstract stock ticker display, on a white background.

name: empty-warehouse.jpg
description: Image of a full, vast, and empty industrial warehouse with high ceilings, polished concrete floors, and stark light coming from high windows.

name: warehouse-shelf.png
description: A single, colourful, tall industrial-style metal warehouse shelf, viewed from a straight-on perspective, completely empty and clean, on a white background.

name: corporate-hall.jpg
description: Image of a full, long, and sleek corporate hallway with highly polished floors reflecting the modern ceiling lights, creating a sense of infinite length.

name: newspaper-headlines-collage.png
description: A colourful, dynamic collage of various newspaper clippings with bold, dramatic headlines about economic downturns, overlapping each other at chaotic angles, on a white background.

name: glowing-gear.png
description: A single, colourful, intricate mechanical gear made of polished brass, glowing with a bright golden light from its center, viewed head-on, on a white background.

name: industrial-machine.jpg
description: Image of a full, complex, and heavy industrial machine in a factory setting, with interlocking gears, shiny pipes, and a metallic texture, looking powerful and operational.

name: server-room-glow.png
description: A colourful, detailed illustration of a single, tall rack of computer servers with rhythmic blinking blue and green LED lights, viewed from a direct front angle, on a white background.

name: stormy-sky.jpg
description: Image of a full, dramatic, and dark stormy sky filled with swirling, menacing grey and black clouds, with a hint of lightning in the distance.

name: floating-city.png
description: A colourful, fantastical illustration of a futuristic city with sleek, impossibly tall towers and small flying vehicles, all built upon a massive floating island of rock and clouds, on a white background.

name: strong-cow.png
description: A colourful, cartoonishly muscular and heroic-looking cow standing proudly on its hind legs, wearing a flowing red cape, viewed from a low angle to emphasize its strength, on a white background.

name: stormy-sea.jpg
description: Image of a full, turbulent, and stormy sea with large, powerful, crashing waves kicking up white foam under a dark, overcast sky.

name: strong-tree.png
description: A colourful, large, ancient oak tree with an exceptionally thick trunk and sprawling, powerful roots that are visibly gripping the ground, rendered in vibrant greens and deep browns, on a white background.

name: lighthouse-storm.jpg
description: Image of a full, powerful scene of a tall, stoic lighthouse being battered by massive ocean waves during a violent storm at night, its bright light beam cutting defiantly through the dark rain.

name: calm-sea-sunrise.png
description: A colourful, serene illustration of a perfectly calm sea reflecting a beautiful, multi-hued sunrise, with a bright orange and yellow sun just cresting the horizon, on a white background.
